Sigil of the Mastermind COL
U 2UU 4 Legendary Enchantment Enchantment
1 Sigil — Your starting deck contains at least forty cards more than the minimum deck size. (At the beginning of the first upkeep, if this card’s sigil condition is met, you may reveal it from your sideboard and put it onto the battlefield.) Indestructible You may cast spells as though they had flash. You may only cast one spell from your hand each turn. At the beginning of your end step, if you have fewer than seven cards in hand, draw cards equal to the difference.
Sigil of the Warmind COL
W 2WW 4 Legendary Enchantment Enchantment
1 Sigil — Your starting deck contains no creature cards. (At the beginning of the first upkeep, if this card’s sigil condition is met, you may reveal it from your sideboard and put it onto the battlefield.) Indestructible Play with your sideboard revealed. Players may cast non-legendary creature spells from your sideboard that don’t share a name with a creature spell cast this turn. Players may spend mana as if it was mana of any color to cast those spells. Spells cast this way lose flash and can’t have or gain flash. Whenever a non-legendary creature dies, put it into your sideboard.
Sigil of the Hivemind COL
G 2GG 4 Legendary Enchantment Enchantment
1 Sigil — Your starting deck contains only creature and land cards. (At the beginning of the first upkeep, if this card’s sigil condition is met, you may reveal it from your sideboard and put it onto the battlefield.) Indestructible Creature spells with mana value 6 or greater cost {3} less to cast.
Sigil of the Chaosmind COL
R 2RR 4 Legendary Enchantment Enchantment
1 Sigil — Your starting deck contains only land, instant, and sorcery cards. (At the beginning of the first upkeep, if this card’s sigil condition is met, you may reveal it from your sideboard and put it onto the battlefield.) Indestructible {3}: Exile an instant or sorcery card from your hand or graveyard. Any player may activate this ability. Whenever a player casts a spell, counter it unless they pay {1}. If a spell is countered this way, its controller puts a chaos counter on a random card exiled with Sigil of the Chaosmind. That player copies the card they put a counter on, then puts the copy onto the stack under their control. If a card exiled with Sigil of the Chaosmind has three or more chaos counters, put it into its owner’s graveyard.
Sigil of the Madmind COL
B 2BB 4 Legendary Enchantment Enchantment
1 Sigil — Your starting deck contains no land cards. (At the beginning of the first upkeep, if this card’s sigil condition is met, you may reveal it from your sideboard and put it onto the battlefield.) Indestructible At the beginning of your upkeep, put two insanity counters on Sigil of the Madmind. Remove X insanity counters from Sigil of the Madmind, where X is 1 plus the number of colors named for Sigil of the Madmind: Name a color for Sigil of the Madmind. Remove an insanity counter from Sigil of the Madmind: Add one mana of a color named with Sigil of the Madmind.
